name: Milky Strike
description:
The new owner has purchased an old farm and is putting things in order. But one brave cow is fighting against the regime of an evil tyrant. Help her to defeat the stupid people and return everything to its place!

Game Features:
  • - Hardcore
  • - Old school
  • - Beautiful Pixel-Art
  • - Funny setting

Controls:
  • Arrows - Movement
  • Z - Shooting To The Left
  • X - Shooting To The Right
  • Z+X - Shooting Straight
